channel.title: How to make karil work properly?
channel.description: does anyone know how to make karil range you? i fixed his emote so it LOOKS like karil is ranging you, but alas he meles :/

item.title: How to make karil work properly?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

uh…k
anyways.
how can i make karil work, would i have to make a new boolean for range?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make karil work properly?

item.title: How to make karil work properly?
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

[quote=“ownage plz, post:6, topic:127720”]Under that method add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = ###; hitDiff = misc.random(##); p.stillgfx(###, p.absY, p.absX); }

Then to make it work you search for attackplayermage going up from that you’ll see something like if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246 || npcs[i].npcType == 1159 || npcs[i].npcType == 54) AttackPlayerMage(i); else AttackPlayer(i);

and one below it a little bit that looks similar add || npcs[i].npcType == 2025

to both of them[/quote]
if im correct that isnt a method lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to make karil work properly?

item.title: How to make karil work properly?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

yeh thanks,
a quick note, if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246 || npcs[i].npcType == 1159 || npcs[i].npcType == 54) AttackPlayerMage(i);
i couldnt use this because when i compiled it didnt recognise " . " so i jus copied a code above it and used its format and it worked … and thanks

now i jus need range for karil

Read full topic
item.source: How to make karil work properly?

item.title: How to make karil work properly?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Under that method add

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = ###; hitDiff = misc.random(##); p.stillgfx(###, p.absY, p.absX); }

Then to make it work you search for attackplayermage going up from that you’ll see something like if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == false && npcs[i].IsUnderAttack == true) { if(npcs[i].npcType == 1645 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 509 || npcs[i].npcType == 1241 || npcs[i].npcType == 1246 || npcs[i].npcType == 1159 || npcs[i].npcType == 54) AttackPlayerMage(i); else AttackPlayer(i);

and one below it a little bit that looks similar add || npcs[i].npcType == 2025

to both of them

Read full topic
